name: Chaos Ball
description:
You control a green ball on a track, which goes later up and down. Don't fall down! When you fall down you must start the level at the begin. There are red obstacles, when you touch them you lose a hitpoint. You have ten hitpoints, when you lose all you lose a life. There are also blue diamants which give you hitpoints back. There are four levels.

Controls are with the cursor-keys, with the mouse you can look around.
